participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to sing and talk about fun things.
participant_1.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i am four years old. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and easy-going, enjoys chatting about everyday life and music.
participant_2.background: my favourite music is country music. i drive a nissan pathfinder. i've short brown hair. i'm a convenience store manager.
